sections.heading: issued by public utilities, as defined in this act, shall not be subject to any of the provisions of Title 71 of the Oklahoma Statutes relating to the Oklahoma Securities Commission
sections.text: Added by Laws 1947, p. 84, ยง 8, emerg. eff. May 21, 1947. Amended by Laws 2022, c. 77, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 2022.
